AI Interface

How does RAG improve LLM responses?

AI Assistant

RAG enhances LLMs by retrieving relevant context from a knowledge base before generating responses, reducing hallucinations and improving accuracy.

About

Engineering the AI-Native Future

I'm a frontend engineer passionate about the intersection of human-centered design and artificial intelligence. Currently at Wipro, I architect interfaces that make complex AI systems feel intuitive and responsive.

My work spans the full spectrum of AI-enhanced frontend development — from streaming chat interfaces that feel instantaneous to visual workflow builders for multi-agent systems. I believe the best AI interfaces fade into the background, letting users focus on their goals while the technology handles the complexity.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring the latest LLM research, contributing to open-source AI tools, or experimenting with generative UI patterns. I'm based in Hyderabad, India and open to remote opportunities worldwide.
